0.Summary: "Franchise locations are terrible—avoid like the plague."
0.Pros: Flexible schedule for students.Discount on employee meals.Guaranteed hours if you can do your job well.
0.Cons: Customers are terrible sometimes.Managers play favorites; owner is no help as long as money is being made.Uniform consists of thick shirts and pants with no air in summer.Franchise locations pay next to nothing. Managers make $10.25 an hour.Revolving door of employees; trainees quit before finishing training because of lack of patience from managers who expect too much too soon.
